moves.1. e4:
I believe that it's the first time in my life that I succeed a game in  five moves with a queen sacrifice. Can you find, please if he had another solution.
"ok boss, let's go"
moves.1... e5 2. d4: Center game. "The second central scout squad, it's your turn"
moves.2... exd4: "Bad luck for you second central scout squad"
moves.3. c3: "The c scout squad is now reluctant to accomplish his duty but has to  go anyway"
moves.3... dxc3: "We shall revenge you, c scout squad"
moves.4. Nxc3: Lasker variation. I like it. "See, the first motorised regiment has liquidated the ennemy"
moves.4... Bb4: Doesn't aim at the center which is even more important because of the open files
moves.5... Nf6 6. Bd3:
To develop as quickly as possible to use the initiative given by the gambit.
"By our informations, the adversary will set is GQ on g8. Occupate the battlefield center and aim a machine gun on his position.
moves.8... Qc7:
Mistake, the black pieces are blocked in the corner.
"The heavy armored black regiment  aims at our headquarters"
moves.9. e5:
To free the b1 h7 diagonal for the bishop.
"Go and explore the terrain, you feel lonesome but I don't care"
moves.9... Ng4: "Boss, a black motorised compagny comes near"
moves.10. Re1:
Carrying on developing. There is only one black piece on the right
"Everybody ! Go out"
moves.11... Nxe5 12. Qh5: It's finished, mate in four moves (appart of the possible sacrifices from queen, knight or rooks) I don't see what black can do to avoid it. But if you find a way...
moves.12... h6 13. Qxf7+: queen sacrifice. Black has to take to avoid the mate (if13. ... h8, 14. Qxe8)
moves.15. Bh7+: Black submited there but I add the mate.
